name: Attack
note:
<setup action>
display action
if user.attackMotion() !== 'missile'
camera focus: target
zoom: 150%, 20
 if user.isActor()
 camera offset: right, 50
 else
 camera offset: left, 50
 end
else
camera focus: user
zoom: 150%, 20
wait for zoom
camera focus: target
wait for camera
 if user.isActor()
 camera offset: right, 50
 else
 camera offset: left, 50
 end
end
</setup action>

if user.attackMotion() !== 'missile'
move user: targets, front, 20
else
perform start

wait for movement

wait: 10
action animation
wait for animation
action effect
wait for effect
wait for movement
wait: 5
</target action>

clear battle log

reset zoom
perform finish
wait for movement
</finish action>

name: Guard
note:
<Custom User Barrier 1 Turns>
 var shield = user.def + user.mdf;
 var missingHpRate = 1 - user.hpRate();
 shield *= (1 + missingHpRate);
 shield = Math.floor(shield);
 value = shield;
</Custom User Barrier 1 Turns>

description: Reveal the properties of a single enemy.
name: Scan
note:
<Skill Types: 1 to 3>

<Instant>
<Before Eval>
if (target.isEnemy()) {
  var id = target._enemyId;
  $gameSystem.addHpGaugeEnemy(id);

  var text = target.name() + '\n';
if (target.enemyId() !== 17) {
  text += '\\px[100]\\c[4]HP:\\c[0] ' + target.hp;
  text += '/' + target.mhp;
  text += '\\px[400]\\c[4]MP:\\c[0] ' + target.mp;
  text += '/' + target.mmp;
  text += '\n';
  text += '\\px[100]\\c[4]ATK:\\c[0] ' + target.atk;
  text += '\\px[400]\\c[4]MAT:\\c[0] ' + target.mat;
  text += '\\px[700]\\c[4]AGI:\\c[0] ' + target.agi;
  text += '\n';
  text += '\\px[100]\\c[4]DEF:\\c[0] ' + target.def;
  text += '\\px[400]\\c[4]MDF:\\c[0] ' + target.mdf;
  text += '\\px[700]\\c[4]FOC:\\c[0] ' + target.luk;
} else {
  text += '\\px[100]\\c[4]HP:\\c[0] ' + '???';
  text += '/' + '???';
  text += '\\px[400]\\c[4]MP:\\c[0] ' + '???';
  text += '/' + '???';
  text += '\n';
  text += '\\px[100]\\c[4]ATK:\\c[0] ' + '???';
  text += '\\px[400]\\c[4]MAT:\\c[0] ' + '???';
  text += '\\px[700]\\c[4]AGI:\\c[0] ' + '???';
  text += '\n';
  text += '\\px[100]\\c[4]DEF:\\c[0] ' + '???';
  text += '\\px[400]\\c[4]MDF:\\c[0] ' + '???';
  text += '\\px[700]\\c[4]FOC:\\c[0] ' + '???';
}
  $gameMessage.add(text);
 
  var weakness = '';
  var resist = '';
  var immune = '';
  var absorb = '';
  var elements = $dataSystem.elements;
  for (var i = 1; i < elements.length; ++i) {
    var name = elements[i];
    var rate = target.elementRate(i);
    if (rate > 1) {
      weakness += name + ' ';
    } else if (rate < 0) {
      absorb += name + ' ';
    } else if (rate === 0) {
      immune += name + ' ';
    } else if (rate < 1) {
      resist += name + ' ';
    }
  }
  if (weakness === '') weakness = 'None';
  if (resist === '') resist = 'None';
  if (immune === '') immune = 'None';
  if (absorb === '') absorb = 'None';
  if (target.enemyId() === 17) {
  weakness = '\\c[4]Weakness:\\c[0] ' + '???' + '\n';
  resist = '\\c[4]Resist:\\c[0] ' + '???' + '\n';
  immune = '\\c[4]Immune:\\c[0] ' + '???' + '\n';
  absorb = '\\c[4]Absorb:\\c[0] ' + '???';
} else {
  weakness = '\\c[4]Weakness:\\c[0] ' + weakness + '\n';
  resist = '\\c[4]Resist:\\c[0] ' + resist + '\n';
  immune = '\\c[4]Immune:\\c[0] ' + immune + '\n';
  absorb = '\\c[4]Absorb:\\c[0] ' + absorb;
}
  text = weakness + resist + immune + absorb;
  $gameMessage.add(text);

 var type = '';
 var text = '\\c[4]Class:\\c[0]' + '\n';
// var states = $dataStates;
 for (var i = 72; i < 86; ++i) {
 if (target.isStateAffected(i)) {
 var icon = $dataStates[i].iconIndex;
 var name = $dataStates[i].name;
 type += '\\i[' + icon + '] ' + name + '\n';
 }
}
if (target.enemyId() === 17) {
 type = '???';
}
 text += type;
 $gameMessage.add(text);
}
</Before Eval>

description: Attempts to stun an enemy.
name: Soul Sacrifice
note:
<Cooldown: 7>
<Custom Requirement>
// Get the group that the user belongs to.
var group = user.friendsUnit();
// Get the alive members of the group.
var allies = group.aliveMembers();
// Check to see if there are more than 1 allied members (user + ally).
value = allies.length > 1;
</Custom Requirement>

<Custom Cost Display>
\i[1]Ally
</Custom Cost Display>

<Custom Execution>
// Get the group that the user belongs to.
var group = user.friendsUnit();
// Get the alive members of the group.
var allies = group.aliveMembers();
// Remove the user from the group.
allies.splice(allies.indexOf(user), 1);
// Pick a random ally.
var ally = allies[Math.floor(Math.random() * allies.length)];
// Store the ally's current HP value with the user.
user._allyHp = ally.hp;
// Store the ally's current MAT value with the user.
user._allyMat = ally.mat;
// Play animation 65 on the ally.
ally.startAnimation(65);
// Time to kill off the ally.
ally.gainHp(-1 * ally.hp);
// Perform the collapse effect on the ally.
ally.performCollapse();

name: Dark Sacrifice
note:
<Cooldown: 15>
<Custom Requirement>
// Get the group that the user belongs to.
var group = user.friendsUnit();
// Get the alive members of the group.
var allies = group.aliveMembers();
// Check to see if there are more than 1 allied members (user + ally).
value = allies.length > 1;
</Custom Requirement>

<Custom Cost Display>
\i[1]Ally
</Custom Cost Display>

<Custom Execution>
// Get the group that the user belongs to.
var group = user.friendsUnit();
// Get the alive members of the group.
var allies = group.aliveMembers();
// Remove the user from the group.
allies.splice(allies.indexOf(user), 1);
for (var i = 0; i < allies.length; ++i) {
 var ally = allies[i];
 user._allyHp = user._allyHp || 0;
  user._allyMat = user._allyMat || 0;
  user._allyHp += ally.hp;
  user._allyMat += ally.mat;
// Play animation 65 on the ally.
ally.startAnimation(245);
// Time to kill off the ally.
ally.gainHp(-1 * ally.hp);
// Perform the collapse effect on the ally.
ally.performCollapse();
}

var text = '<CENTER>' + '\\i[330]Dark Sacrifice';
SceneManager._scene._logWindow._lines.push(text);
SceneManager._scene._logWindow.refresh();
text = '<CENTER>' + user.name() + ' has sacrificed all allies!';
SceneManager._scene._logWindow._lines.push(text);
SceneManager._scene._logWindow.refresh();
var waitframes = 120;
BattleManager._actionList.push(['WAIT', [waitframes]]);
</Custom Execution>

<Damage Formula>
// Damage Formula used for the skill.
value = user._allyHp * 0.3 + user._allyMat * 0.4;
// Remove stored ally HP value.
user._allyHp = undefined;
// Remove stored ally MAT value.
user._allyMat = undefined;
</Damage Formula>

description: Hits all enemies with a burning tornado.
name: Winged Glide
note:
<Cooldown: 3>
<setup action>
display action
opacity not focus: 0%, 20
wait for opacity
SE: Wind8
move user: forward, 120, 10
float user: 300%, 90
wait for movement
move user: backward, 240, 45
wait for movement
wait for float
opacity user: 0%, 1
wait for opacity
move user: home, 1
wait for movement

wai//t: 60

move user: backward, 240, 1
wait for movement
</setup action>

<whole action>
</whole action>

<target action>
action animation
move user: forward, 1480, 10
wait: 6
action effect
wait for effect
wait for movement
wait for animation
move user: point, -480, -240, 1
wait for movement
float user: 300%, 1
wait for float
</target action>

<follow action>
opacity user: 100%, 1
wait for opacity
move user: home, 90
float user: 0%, 60
wait for movement
wait for float
wait: 30
opacity not focus: 100%, 20
wait for opacity
</follow action>

<finish action>
clear battle log
perform finish
</finish action>

description: Hits all enemies with a burning tornado.
name: Drain
note:
<action copy: skill:1>

<Pre-Damage Eval>
user._storedPower = user._storedPower || 0;
user._storedPower += value;
user.addState(68);
</Pre-Damage Eval>

<Post-Damage Eval>
var text = '<CENTER>' + user.name() + ' has ' + user._storedPower + ' damage stored';
SceneManager._scene._logWindow._lines.push(text);
SceneManager._scene._logWindow.refresh();
var waitframes = 60;
BattleManager._actionList.push(['WAIT', [waitframes]]);
</Post-Damage Eval>

description: Hits all enemies with a burning tornado.
name: Transform
note:
<Cooldown: 3>
<setup action>
</setup action>

<whole action>
</whole action>

<target action>
</target action>

<follow action>
wait: 60
action animation
wait for animation
wait: 45
flash screen: white, 60
eval: user.transform(21)
wait: 60
action effect
wait: 60
</follow action>

<Custom Execution>
var text = '<CENTER>' + user.name() + ' is transforming!';
SceneManager._scene._logWindow._lines.push(text);
SceneManager._scene._logWindow.refresh();
var waitframes = 120;
BattleManager._actionList.push(['WAIT', [waitframes]]);
</Custom Execution>

<After Eval>
var text = '<CENTER>' + user.name() + ' has transformed!';
SceneManager._scene._logWindow._lines.push(text);
SceneManager._scene._logWindow.refresh();
var waitframes = 30;
BattleManager._actionList.push(['WAIT', [waitframes]]);

var hpGain = user.mhp - user.hp;
user.gainHp(hpGain);
</After Eval>

description: Hits all enemies with a burning tornado.
name: Unleash
note:
<Cooldown: 20>

<Pre-Damage Eval>
user._storedPower = user._storedPower || 0;
value += user._storedPower * 1.2;
</Pre-Damage Eval>

<Post-Damage Eval>
user.removeState(68);
</Post-Damage Eval>
